overview: A young girl has outgrown fairy tales. She spends her days drawing and studying birds. Although she doesn’t boast about it, she considers herself to be a “scientist of birds.” Of course, as a “girl of science,” she doesn’t believe in fairy tales anymore. But in order not to hurt her younger sister, she must find a way to convince her that magic exists in her ordinary world. In doing so, she discovers the extraordinary was waiting for her all along.
title: Birdhouse
